activities: Motiga collects personally identifiable information for customer account creation, newsletter signup, billing, customer service, improving services, system analysis, data analysis, fraud detection and prevention, and product registration
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on line and off line customer data
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Motiga has selected JAMS ADR to investigate unresolved complaints.
